name: Sharkoon - catch em alone
description: This is a game where you are in a see of fish and have to feed yourself. The fish are controlled by different flocking algorithms and if you attack one fish in a flock, the whole swarm will attack you. So to prevent that, you swim into a flock and split it up so the fish are in their own. Now you can eat them in without worries because they are weaker alone.  Please leave a comment for feedback as it really helps me out. I hope you enjoy my game!
